title: 服务器无法开启
author: Orange_Heart
txt_content:
纯净服想装MOD
把CB换成MCPC+之后无法启动
后台报错：
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Not restarting crashed server.
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Server stopped
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Server shut down
03.10 01:21:10 [Server] INFO Error: Unable to access jarfile /cauldron
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Failed to copy jarfile from global JAR directory
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] JAR file not found, copying from global JAR directory
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "Default"
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Starting server!
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
03.10 01:21:10 [Multicraft] Received start command
03.10 01:21:08 [Multicraft] Loading server properties

replies.author: 科学算个吊
replies.txt_content: 应该有错误报告生成的吧

replies.author: 矿工小周
replies.txt_content: 去掉mod调试一下或者是有些插件不支持mcpc+的，我也遇到过这样情况，当时是删去了一些插件即可
